tasks.title: Deploy Stripe Cloud Functions
tasks.description: Run firebase deploy --only functions to enable payments

tasks.title: Set up Stripe webhook in dashboard
tasks.description: Add webhook endpoint URL and select checkout.session.completed event

tasks.title: Test TV Mode on real display
tasks.description: Open TakkArena on office TV and test fullscreen mode

tasks.title: Add PersonalBestsWidget to Dashboard
tasks.description: Import and add the new widget component to the main dashboard

tasks.title: Fix ArnarFlow build issues
tasks.description: Run npm install from PowerShell to fix rollup binary mismatch

tasks.title: Test Eignamat valuation on sample properties
tasks.description: Run valuation v2.1 tests for Hlíðargerði 17, Mjóahlíð 12 and Skúlagata 46; compare results to previous runs and log differences.

tasks.title: Configure Stripe billing portal and test subscription flows
tasks.description: Enable billing portal in Stripe dashboard, configure customer portal, and test subscription upgrades/downgrades and cancellations.

tasks.title: Publish Eignamat blog post: 'Hvernig virkar gervigreind í fasteignamati?'
tasks.description: Review blog-post-1.md, add images, schedule publish and share social posts.

tasks.title: Review & deploy Eignamat email onboarding sequence
tasks.description: Validate content in email-sequence.md, set up in transactional email service and schedule the onboarding sequence.

tasks.title: Verify TV Mode kiosk password & celebration overlays
tasks.description: Test kiosk exit password 'takk2026', celebration overlays and auto-rotate behavior; fix any UI issues.

tasks.title: Review and merge betrithu firebase-refactor PR
tasks.description: Review PR blaer/firebase-refactor on GitHub, run tests locally and merge when ready.

tasks.title: Deploy Betrithu to staging and smoke-test recording streaming API
tasks.description: Deploy the firebase refactor branch to staging and test recording playback, checkout and orders flow.

tasks.title: Verify Stripe/Swipe payment integration on Betrithu
tasks.description: Run end-to-end checkout tests, verify webhook handling and order fulfillment flows.

tasks.title: Archive Kosningagátt & write postmortem
tasks.description: Create an archive bundle of the Kosningagátt codebase and write a short postmortem summarizing outcomes, metrics and learnings.

tasks.title: Store voter-compare outputs and Zenter scrape data in archive
tasks.description: Save kjosendur.json, kjosendur.txt and voter-compare exports into the project archive folder for future reference.

tasks.title: Review and merge ArnarFlow v4.3 PR
tasks.description: Open PR blær/v4.3-features, run a local build (PowerShell if needed), review the changes and merge; publish release notes.

tasks.title: Test DataExportImport backup & onboarding flow in ArnarFlow
tasks.description: Export current data to JSON, import back, and run the onboarding modal flow to verify onboardingComplete flags and data integrity.

tasks.title: Create Gleðinefnd budget & savings plan
tasks.description: Draft event committee budget including a target savings goal (300,000 ISK) and a weekly contribution plan (10,000 ISK/week).

tasks.title: Build weekly savings tracker and recurring check
tasks.description: Add a simple weekly tracker (sheet or ArnarFlow task) to record 10,000 ISK contributions and set up automated weekly reminders.

tasks.title: Plan meal-prep alternative to Wolt and estimate monthly savings
tasks.description: Create a 4-week meal-prep plan, grocery list, and compare costs to recent Wolt orders to estimate monthly savings.

ideas.title: AI Bookkeeping SaaS for Icelandic SMBs
ideas.content: Auto-reconcile with DK/Navision. Target: small businesses. Price: 4.900-14.900 kr/mán

ideas.title: Wearable Health Coach App
ideas.content: Connect Apple Watch/Fitbit data with AI for personalized health advice
